summary: Frontend testing completed for Admin Dashboard redesign with Walks/Overnights/Daycare tabs and Overnight Calendar status labels. All requested features verified working correctly.
passed_tests: Admin Dashboard: Walks tab present with data-testid='walks-tab'
Admin Dashboard: Walks tab shows Pending/Completed/Cancelled filter buttons
Admin Dashboard: Overnights tab present with data-testid='overnights-tab'
Admin Dashboard: Overnights tab shows Check In/Staying/Check Out summary cards with counts
Admin Dashboard: Overnights tab shows overnight stay items with 'Check In' action button
Admin Dashboard: Daycare tab present with data-testid='daycare-tab'
Admin Dashboard: Daycare tab shows Expected/Here Now/Picked Up summary cards
Admin Dashboard: Daycare tab shows 'View Daycare Calendar' link when no data
Admin Dashboard: Tab switching works correctly between Walks/Overnights/Daycare
Overnight Calendar: Page loads with data-testid='admin-overnights-page'
Overnight Calendar: Week navigation (prev/next buttons) present
Overnight Calendar: 'Today' button present for quick navigation
Overnight Calendar: 'Check in to start' status label shown on start dates for scheduled stays
Overnight Calendar: 'Awaiting check-in' status label shown on intermediate dates for scheduled stays
Overnight Calendar: Stay details modal opens when clicking a stay
Overnight Calendar: Modal shows pet name, client, service type, status, dates, and action buttons

admin_dashboard_tabs.walks_tab: Present with badge showing count, includes Pending/Completed/Cancelled filters
admin_dashboard_tabs.overnights_tab: Present with badge showing count, includes Check In/Staying/Check Out summary cards
admin_dashboard_tabs.daycare_tab: Present with badge showing count, includes Expected/Here Now/Picked Up summary cards

overnight_calendar_status_labels.check_in_to_start: Shown on start date for scheduled stays (amber background)
overnight_calendar_status_labels.awaiting_checkin: Shown on intermediate dates for scheduled stays (lighter amber)
overnight_calendar_status_labels.checked_in: Configured for in-progress stays (blue background) - no in-progress stays in test data
overnight_calendar_status_labels.check_out_to_end: Configured for end date of in-progress stays - no in-progress stays in test data
overnight_calendar_status_labels.completed: Configured for completed stays (green background) - no completed stays in test data

seed_data_creation: Existing overnight stay data used (Rover - scheduled for Feb 18-20, 2026)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Admin Dashboard now has three sub-tabs within Schedule tab: Walks, Overnights, and Daycare. Each tab shows appropriate content with service-specific filtering. Overnight Calendar at /admin/overnights shows contextual status labels based on stay status (scheduled/in_progress/completed) and date position (start/intermediate/end). Test data includes overnight stay for 'Rover' pet with scheduled status. Location modal appears on first load - dismiss with 'Maybe Later' button using force=True.
